function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Negative indirect effects of covid-19 on the environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in ghg emissions during a short period","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to the internet in rural areas may hinder the evaluation of residents’ knowledge, attitudes, and practices related to covid-19.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recruitment of research participants through online forms excludes residents without access to mobile phones, tablets, and computers, potentially biasing the study results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparity in questionnaire response attention may skew the study results, leading to incomplete and potentially biased findings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of correlation analysis between age and kap variables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on previous studies for evidence of age correlation with covid-19 practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for comprehensive health education program related to covid-19 prevention and control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance of research participants affecting study findings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between gender, age, and other characteristics and attitudes towards covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between knowledge and attitudes towards covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risky behavior related to food serving alone due to unemployment and inability to afford personal protective equipment like facemasks","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparities in healthcare workers’ health practices affecting covid-19 prevention efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-demographic characteristics correlating with knowledge about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low compliance with preventive measures like wearing masks and handwashing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparity in practicing preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Riskiest behavior among certain demographic groups men, unemployed, and single individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants in marginalized areas may have less concern about covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"More information about covid-19 can lead to increased anxiety and worry.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in covid-19 prevention and mitigation practices among participants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of participants afraid to go to common places to avoid infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disagreement on whether corona patients can be treated at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants in certain demographics showing lower attitude scores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misunderstanding about covid-19 transmission and prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underrepresentation of certain regions in the study","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparity in covid-19 knowledge","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low representation of women in the study may skew the results and impact the generalizability of findings.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of misinformation about covid-19 among participants may lead to incorrect beliefs and behaviors regarding the disease.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overwhelming news exposure and reliance on tv and internet for information may impact participants’ understanding of covid-19 and influence their behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low mean covid-19 prevention and mitigation knowledge in specific socio-demographic groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender differences in covid-19 knowledge scores","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of social networking apps for data collection and distribution.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of participants from all indonesian regions.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact during data collection using social networking apps.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of clinical features, signs, and symptoms of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation and misconceptions about covid-19 transmission routes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent practices for preventing and mitigating covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of a questionnaire adapted from another source may lead to cultural and contextual biases in the responses, impacting data quality and validity.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using online methods to collect data during a stay-at-home regulation period.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Distributing the questionnaire through private and group channels in social networking apps.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restricting participation to indonesian residents living overseas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and knowledge among indonesian residents about covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public attitudes and behavioral compliance towards disease prevention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient sociodemographic data analysis for targeted intervention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate knowledge and prevention practice related to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate health protocols and measures taken by the government","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Attention of countries focused on critical intervention for pandemic prevention and mitigation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid global outbreak of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge and attitude on covid-19 promotion and prevention","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Predicted increase in cases without vaccine availability","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
